00128 
00131         Pose pose;
00139         double GetError(int errors = (MARGIN_ERROR | DECODE_ERROR)) const {
00140                 int count = 0;
00141                 double error = 0;
00142                 if (errors & MARGIN_ERROR) {error+=margin_error; count++;}
00143                 if (errors & DECODE_ERROR) {error+=decode_error; count++;}
00144                 if (errors & TRACK_ERROR) {error+=track_error; count++;}
00145                 return error/count;
00146         }
00148         void SetError(int error_type, double value) {
00149                 if (error_type == MARGIN_ERROR) margin_error = value;
00150                 else if (error_type == DECODE_ERROR) decode_error = value;
00151                 else if (error_type == TRACK_ERROR) track_error = value;
00152         }
00153         static const int MARGIN_ERROR=1;
00154         static const int DECODE_ERROR=2;
00155         static const int TRACK_ERROR=4;
00156 protected:
00157         double margin_error;
00158         double decode_error;
00159         double track_error;
00160         double edge_length;
00161         int res;
00162         double margin;
00163         CvMat *marker_content;
00164 
00165 public:
00166 
00168         std::vector<PointDouble> marker_points;
00170         std::vector<PointDouble> marker_corners;
00172         std::vector<PointDouble> marker_corners_img;
00174         std::vector<PointDouble> marker_margin_w;
00176         std::vector<PointDouble> marker_margin_b;
00177 #ifdef VISUALIZE_MARKER_POINTS
00178         std::vector<PointDouble> marker_allpoints_img;
00179 #endif

00266 class ALVAR_EXPORT MarkerIterator : public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag, Marker*> {
00267 public:
00268   virtual bool operator==(const MarkerIterator& other) = 0;
00269   virtual bool operator!=(const MarkerIterator& other) = 0;
00270   virtual MarkerIterator& operator++() = 0;
00271   virtual const Marker* operator*() = 0;
00272   virtual const Marker* operator->() = 0;
00273   virtual MarkerIterator& reset() = 0;
00274 
00275   void *_data;
00276 };
00277 
00282 template<typename T>
00283 class ALVAR_EXPORT MarkerIteratorImpl : public MarkerIterator {
00284 public:
00285   MarkerIteratorImpl(typename std::vector<T>::const_iterator i) : _begin(i), _i(i) {
00286     _data = this;
00287   }
00288 
00289   ~MarkerIteratorImpl() {}
00290 
00291   // The assignment and relational operators are straightforward
00292   MarkerIteratorImpl& operator=(const MarkerIteratorImpl& other) {
00293     _i = other._i;
00294     return(*this);
00295   }
00296 
00297   bool operator==(const MarkerIterator& other) {
00298     MarkerIteratorImpl* pother = (MarkerIteratorImpl*)other._data;
00299     return (_i == pother->_i);
00300   }
00301 
00302   bool operator!=(const MarkerIterator& other) {
00303     MarkerIteratorImpl* pother = (MarkerIteratorImpl*)other._data;
00304     return (_i != pother->_i);
00305   }
00306 
00307   MarkerIterator& operator++() {
00308     _i++;
00309     return(*this);
00310   }
00311 
00312   const Marker* operator*() {
00313     return &(*_i);
00314   }
00315 
00316   const Marker* operator->() {
00317     return &(*_i);
00318   }
00319 
00320   MarkerIterator& reset() {
00321     _i = _begin;
00322     return (*this);
00323   }
00324 
00325 private:
00326   typename std::vector<T>::const_iterator _begin;
00327   typename std::vector<T>::const_iterator _i;
00328 };
